General.Name: Xinjiang Chalkis Co Ltd
General.Description: Chalkis Health Industry Co., Ltd. engages in the production, processing, and sales of tomatoes in China. It offers tomato paste, ketchup, sauce, and lycopene capsules. The company was formerly known as Xinjiang Chalkis Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Chalkis Health Industry Co., Ltd. in May 2016. Chalkis Health Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Wujiaqu, China.
General.Address: Sixth Division State Assets Building, Wujiaqu, China
